message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies-v3_%28mariano%29.pdf: Página 73
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work
COMPARISON OF THE FCA RESULTS
MEREOLOGY AXIOMS AND DEFINITIONS
Dolce-Lite and OBO formalices transitivity of isPartOf and has a term for isProperPartOf, but it does not 
provides an explicit definition.
REUSE COST
The reuse cost does not decide.
UNDERSTANDABILITY EFFORT
Dolce-Lite, SUMO-OWL and Single Part Whole have a high quality of the documentation and high availability of 
external knowledge.
INTEGRATION EFFORT
SUMO-OWL has a high adequacy of knowledge extraction and a high adequacy of naming conventions
RELIABILITY
Obowebsite and OBO have a high purpose reliability, meanwhile SUMO-OWL and Dolce-Lite have a high 
theoretical support.
Requires a low effort
It does not compensate the integration effort
speaker: SYSTEM
